title: PYramid Head
author: PYramid Head
created_time: November 24, 2023, 03:11:25 AMLast edit: December 13, 2023, 06:57:52 AM by PYramid Head
content: Brics Coin Bounty ProgramBrics Coin - The Leading Multilateral CryptocurrenciesBRC is built on blockchain technology, which ensure the transparency, immutability and decentralized nature of transactions.Strong Utility TokenThe BRC Coin will be used on average by member countries, allies and friends, which makes it a strong Utility Token for daily use in the future.Safe Place For GrowthThe BRC coin is the only Token that will be used to ensure bridge transactions, which makes it a safe bet for growth.THE MOST TRUSTED CRYPTOCURRENCY PLATFORM.BRICS COIN (BRC) TECHNOLOGYBOUNTY POOL: 500K BRICS Coin TokenDuration : 4 Week (Escrowed)ALLOCATIONS 1. All participants must join Brics coin official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Discord, Twitter and Instagram.2. All participants must join PYramid Head's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter .3. The bounty program was launched on November 24th, 2023 and will run untilDecember 21th, 2023. Bounty rewards We will process the payout ASAP after we completed the 1 month records.4. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty programimmediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently.5. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration for any campaign.6. Proof of Authentication post is mandatory for participants. All participants have to weekly reports must be submitted on Bounty thread.7. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. This Bounty campaign will use a stake based rewards system.8. The reward distribution of PYramid Head. The distribution will begin on mid of January, 2024.Proof of AuthenthicationCode:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Tron (Trx) Wallet Address:Week:1 (24/11 -- 30/11)Week:2 (1/12 -- 07/12)Week:3 (12/11 -- 18/12)Week:4 (19/12 -- 25/12)  Rules & Qualifications1. Participants must be Follow Brics coin Twitter     2. All participants have at least 500 Followers join this campaign3. Make 3 Tweet about Brics coin on your Twitter account4. Tweet must be meaning full and constructive and mention @bricstechnology5.Make 7 Retweets and 4 comments on Brics coin Twitter page6. Retweet & Tweet must have hashtag: #BRC #BRICS #coinvote #presale #cryptocurrency #CryptoNews #technology #Binanace #IPOAlert  #altcoin #TRON #blockchain #CZBINANCE #BNBChain #ICO Stakes500 - 2500 Followers: 4 stake/week2501 - 5000 Followers: 8 stake/week5001 - 10000 Followers: 12 stake/week10001 - 15000 Followers: 16 stake/weekREGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join NowRewards1 Comment 1 stake/weekAvatar and name: 20 stake/Rules & Qualifications1. Must Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Brics Coin .2. Replace your profile picture with this Avatar.3. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc).4. Write at least 5 constructive messages in Brics coin telegram groups maximum 10 messages 5. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Conversation in the Hashtags "#" are not allowed.6. You must wear Brics coin avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.REGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join NowRules & Qualifications1. Participants must be Follow Brics coin Instagram     2. All participants have at least 500 Followers join this campaign3. Make 3 Post about Brics coin on your Instagram account4. Post must be meaning full and constructive and mention @bricstechnology5.Make 7 Share and 4 comments on Brics coin Instagram page6. Retweet & Tweet must have hashtag: #BRC #BRICS #coinvote #presale #cryptocurrency #CryptoNews #technology #Binanace #IPOAlert  #altcoin #TRON #blockchain #CZBINANCE #BNBChain #ICO Stakes500 - 2500 Followers: 4 stake/week2501 - 5000 Followers: 8 stake/week5001 - 10000 Followers: 12 stake/week10001 - 15000 Followers: 16 stake/weekREGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join NowRewards1 Post 1 stake/week1 Comment 1 stake/weekRules & Qualifications1. Participants have at least 100 karma & Must be Follow Brics Coin Reddit Account .[/b]2. Make minimum 7 Post on Crypto related Group & mention Brics coin maximum 20 post.3. Write at least 3 constructive comments on Brics coin Reddit post maximum 10 comments.4. Post must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, pre sale etc5. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Conversation in the Hashtags "#" are allowed.6. Post & Comments must have hashtag: #BRC #BRICS #coinvote #presale #cryptocurrency #CryptoNews #technology #Binanace #IPOAlert  #altcoin #TRON #blockchain #CZBINANCE #BNBChain #ICO REGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join NowRewards1 Messages 1 stake/weekRules & Qualifications1. Participants Must be Join Brics Coin Discord channel .2. Make minimum 7 Post on Brics coin Discord channel maximum 15 post.3. Meaningless, irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project.4. Post must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, pre sale etc5. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Conversation in the Hashtags "#" are allowed.6. Post & Comments must have hashtag: #BRC #BRICS #coinvote #presale #cryptocurrency #CryptoNews #technology #Binanace #IPOAlert  #altcoin #TRON #blockchain #CZBINANCE #BNBChain #ICO REGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join NowStakes100 - 500 Views: 2 stake/week5001 - 1000 Views: 4 stake/week1001 - 2000 Views: 6 stake/week2001 - 5000 Views: 8 stake/weekRules & Qualifications1. All Participants Must be have at least 100 subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length. 2. Make minimum 1 video about Brics coin per week maximum 2 video week.3. Meaningless, irrelevant video or copy and pasting video by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project.4. All video must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, pre sale etc5. Less 100 views or Deleted video will not be counted. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, or any other social media.6. Video description box must have hashtag: #BRC #BRICS #coinvote #presale #cryptocurrency #CryptoNews #technology #Binanace #IPOAlert  #altcoin #TRON #blockchain #CZBINANCE #BNBChain #ICO REGISTRATION FORM                                                                       Join Now
